text: Robert Remus (born March 27, 1948) better known by his ring name, Sgt. Slaughter, is an American retired professional wrestler. He is currently signed to WWE as an ambassador. He is best known for wrestling in the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). He is also known for us time in the National Wrestling Alliance (NWA) and American Wrestling Association (AWA). He is a one-time WWF Champion and was inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame in 2004 by Pat Patterson. His finishing move was the Camel clutch and then the Cobra clutch. ==References== ==Other websites== *Sgt. Slaughter's Official website *Sgt. title: Sgt. Slaughter
